text: "Meanwhile, more than $133.5 million was spent on 'stress reduction' through things like 'yoga, line dancing, drumming and soul Chi (soulful movement)' and 'equine-facilitated psychotherapy,' the New York Post said of her last nepotism foray (ThriveNYC)... https://t.co/CTdWXDDIBD
